metadata.title: CVE-2018-20184 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20181209 Q8, there is a heap-based bufferoverflow in the WriteTGAImage function of tga.c, which allows attackers tocause a denial of service via a crafted image file, because the number ofrows or columns can exceed the pixel-dimension restrictions of the TGAspecification.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
